personal_info.summary: I am a Software Developer, and throughout my career, I have worked combining Frontend development for web applications and Backend development for services. Currently, I work at @Wompi as a Backend Developer. Since 2021, I've been writing my first lines of code, and since then, I've considered myself a curious, self-taught, open-minded individual with the resilience to tackle big challenges both individually and as part of a team. I am passionate about technology and how it can positively impact society.

responsibilities: Mutual TLS with an external party using SOAP communication.
Certified as AWS Developer, with knowledge of PCI-DSS.
Participation in large high-impact initiatives, such as the creation of multiple microservices for transactional processing.
Skilled in coding, applying various patterns and architectures, with the application of SOLID principles.
Knowledge and experience in creating a cryptography library.
Experience in BDD, DDD, Scrum, and Kanban methodologies.
Creating solutions and collaborating with a team on the development of new products and payment methods
Strengthening and applying cloud knowledge with AWS
achievements: Gained greater involvement and trust in both Frontend and Backend areas due to the nature of my current team and our focus on improving the technological core.

responsibilities: Creating features and maintaining web applications such as Docs, Dashboards, BackOffices, SPAs, landing pages.
